SELECT , c.id AS "contactId", c.name AS "contactName", c.address AS "contactAddress", c.email AS "contactEmail", c.phone AS "contactPhone", cg.name AS "customerGroupName" FROM customer a LEFT JOIN contact c ON c.customer_id = a.id LEFT JOIN customer_group cg ON cg.supplier_id = a.supplier_id AND a.customer_group_id = cg.id
WHERE a.id = #{id}
